about_the_game:
Vagnerun is an isometric top-down racing game that blends adrenaline, strategy, and combat!

Embark on an adventure across different planets, each with 3 challenging tracks filled with unique obstacles and benefits. Win races, accumulate points, and progress to new tracks where the competition only gets tougher. Only the most skilled and strategic pilots survive and qualify for the next stages!

Between races, take the opportunity to upgrade your ship with a robust upgrade system: boost the engine for higher maximum speed, increase the capacity and power of the nitro, enhance your armor to withstand more damage, and choose from five types of shots to keep your opponents on the defensive. Repair your ship, buy items like shields and orbital spheres, and get ready to win at any cost!

Join intense races with up to 10 ships where you can jump and shoot at opponents to claim the lead. With support for two-player split-screen gameplay, Vagnerun promises fierce battles and unforgettable local fun.

Earn money by destroying obstacles, eliminating opponents, or collecting prizes on the tracks. Face the competition and fight to place in the top three in each set of 3 tracks to unlock the next planet and continue your galactic journey.

Prove that you are the best pilot in the universe and complete the ultimate challenge of conquering all the planets!

Get ready for speed, strategy, and action in Vagnerun – where winning is not just a matter of skill, but of survival.

Key Features of the Game:

  • Galactic Exploration: Compete on 24 unique planets, each with 3 challenging tracks filled with obstacles, hazards, and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

  • Intense Game Modes:

    • Championship Mode: Prove your skills in traditional races. Finish in the top 3 on each planet to unlock the next one.

    • Elimination Mode: Face the challenge of reverse tracks and survive! In each race, 3 competitors are eliminated. At the end of the 3 tracks, only one pilot will move on to the next planet. Will it be you?

  • Upgrade System: Customize your ship to become the most competitive in the galaxy!

    • Boost performance with upgrades like engines, accelerators, and nitro.

    • Enhance combat strategies with armor, weapons, and special items.

    • Choose your upgrades wisely to create a ship that balances speed, power, and strategy.

  • Action-Packed Races:

    • Engage in combat with enemies while dodging traps and obstacles.

    • Destroy towers, leap over dangers, and use boosters scattered across tracks to gain an advantage.

    • Here, speed alone isn’t enough, you must fight for victory!

  • Fun Multiplayer:

    • Play in split-screen for 2 players and challenge your friends or family.

    • Supports 1 keyboard and 1 controller, offering an accessible and thrilling experience for epic head-to-head matches.

  • Battles Against AI: Test your skills against computer-controlled enemies with dynamic and challenging gameplay for endless fun.
